meanings.definition: A thick, cheesy secretion that accumulates under the foreskin or around the clitoris.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that smegma can build up if not cleaned regularly.
meanings.sent2: It is important to wash regularly to prevent the accumulation of smegma.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that smegma sounds like a fancy cheese name.
meanings.sent4: The neglected garden resembled the smegma under the foreskin.
meanings.sent5: The smell of smegma was so strong, it could be detected from afar.

meanings.definition: Foul-smelling, cheesy substance that can accumulate under the foreskin or around the clitoris.
meanings.sent1: The nurse advised on the importance of hygiene to avoid the foul smell of smegma.
meanings.sent2: The foul odor indicated the presence of smegma around the clitoris.
meanings.sent3: The children wrinkled their noses at the mention of smegma during the health class.
meanings.sent4: The dark alley reeked of smegma, making it unbearable to pass through.
meanings.sent5: The texture of smegma was likened to spoiled cheese, making it repulsive.
